name: Hannes Ber
objective: 本課程旨在引導學生閱讀英美短篇故事，探討其敘事技巧、情節、人物、觀點和語言等，如何在故事中建構意義，並著重故事所傳達的文化意涵。

scorePolicy: In addition to the midterm and the final exam (30% each), you will have to serve as ”expert” on one of the texts (10%), on which you will also write a short response paper of ca. 1.000 words (20%; please use Courier New, 12pt, 1½ space). In-class participation will account for another 10% of the grade.
